channel.title: Comments on: Raleigh Code Camp Followup
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Rob Rowe
item.dc:creator: Rob Rowe
item.content:encoded:
Eli,

I’m glad you got something from my talk. The little side project that spawned the talk has opened my eyes to a lot of potential projects.

I liked how you brought unit testing down to earth. How it can be used in everyone’s day to day process to improve their situation.

It was nice meeting you this weekend.

Rob Rowe
